response.overview: A sexy housewife (Hazel Moore) finds out her husband (Ryan) has a low sperm count – making it near impossible for her to become pregnant. Desperate, Hazel begins to think of alternative ways to start a family. She decides to look for a surrogate stud that will surely possess potent seed. Determined and a bit curious, Hazel visits a local male strip club where she believes she may find a willing contestant. She tells herself “she’s doing it for her husband”, but once Hazel tastes the fun and excitement of a private dance by a male stud, she becomes addicted… addicted to having male dancers plant their seed.
response.title: He Can't Seed Me
